Name: prompt-embedded-file
Description: For a given image, this agent provides a report describing the damage

Name: prompt-supplied-by-user
Description: For a given image, this agent provides a report describing if the image meets guidelines supplied by user

Name: prompt-in-profile-json
Description: For a given image, this agent provides a report describing if the image meets color-blindness guidelines

Agents.Name: ColorReview
Agents.UserMessage:
inline::Evaluate the proposed image for compliance with the Color Blind Association requirements.

Review each requirement and provide a TRUE or FALSE tag for compliance. If non-compliant,
describe why not.

Return results as a table.

## COMPLIANCE REQUIREMENTS:

The image must meet the following criteria:

(1) Colors that color-blind may confuse should not be close to each other on the image.
(2) The image should not rely on color to convey information.
(3) The image should use a color scheme that is color-blind friendly.
